cards.definition_en: To increase speed or cause something to move faster.
cards.definition_zh: 让速度变快，或使某物加快前进。
cards.example_en: Mario accelerates off the starting grid to grab the lead.
cards.example_zh: 马里奥在起跑线上迅速加速，抢占领先位置。

cards.definition_en: A powered aircraft that is lighter than air; a flying vessel.
cards.definition_zh: 比空气轻的动力飞行器;飞行器。
cards.example_en: Race through Airship Fortress high above the clouds!
cards.example_zh: 在云端之上的飞艇要塞中比赛!

cards.definition_en: A tropical fruit; in Mario Kart, a peel used as a trap on the track.
cards.definition_zh: 一种热带水果;在马里奥赛车中,香蕉皮用作赛道上的陷阱。
cards.example_en: Drop banana peels to make your rivals slip and spin!
cards.example_zh: 扔下香蕉皮让你的对手打滑旋转!

cards.definition_en: A fight or contest between opponents; a competitive game mode.
cards.definition_zh: 对手之间的战斗或竞赛;竞技游戏模式。
cards.example_en: Compete in Balloon Battle to pop your rivals' balloons!
cards.example_zh: 参加气球对战戳破对手的气球!

cards.definition_en: A sandy or pebbly shore beside a body of water.
cards.definition_zh: 水体旁边的沙质或砾石海岸。
cards.example_en: Race along the sunny shores of Peach Beach!
cards.example_zh: 在碧琪海滩阳光灿烂的海岸上比赛!

cards.definition_en: A squid-like creature that sprays ink to block opponents' vision.
cards.definition_zh: 鱿鱼般的生物,喷射墨汁阻挡对手的视线。
cards.example_en: The Blooper splashes ink all over your screen!
cards.example_zh: 乌贼在你的屏幕上喷洒墨汁!

cards.definition_en: An explosive device; in Mario Kart, a Bob-omb that creates a large explosion.
cards.definition_zh: 爆炸装置;在马里奥赛车中,炸弹怪会制造大爆炸。
cards.example_en: Wario throws bob-ombs to blast through the competition!
cards.example_zh: 瓦里奥扔炸弹炸飞竞争对手!

cards.definition_en: To increase or improve something; in racing, a sudden increase in speed.
cards.definition_zh: 增加或改进某物;在赛车中,速度的突然提升。
cards.example_en: Get a boost start by timing your acceleration perfectly!
cards.example_zh: 通过完美把握加速时机获得起跑加速!

cards.definition_en: A projectile shot from a weapon; transforms racer into high-speed missile.
cards.definition_zh: 从武器射出的弹丸;将赛车手变成高速导弹。
cards.example_en: Transform into a Bullet Bill and fly past everyone!
cards.example_zh: 变成子弹刺客飞越所有人!

cards.definition_en: A large fortified building from medieval times; a stronghold.
cards.definition_zh: 中世纪时期的大型防御建筑;堡垒。
cards.example_en: Bowser's Castle is the most dangerous track!
cards.example_zh: 酷霸王城堡是最危险的赛道!

cards.definition_en: A difficult task or problem that tests one's abilities.
cards.definition_zh: 考验能力的困难任务或问题。
cards.example_en: Every cup presents a new challenge to overcome!
cards.example_zh: 每个杯赛都呈现需要克服的新挑战!

cards.definition_en: A person who has defeated all opponents in a competition.
cards.definition_zh: 在比赛中击败所有对手的人。
cards.example_en: Mario becomes the racing champion once again!
cards.example_zh: 马里奥再次成为赛车冠军!

cards.definition_en: A person in a game, story, or play; a playable figure.
cards.definition_zh: 游戏、故事或戏剧中的人物;可操作的角色。
cards.example_en: Choose your favorite character to race with!
cards.example_zh: 选择你最喜欢的角色来比赛!

cards.definition_en: A closed track or path for racing; a circular route.
cards.definition_zh: 用于比赛的封闭赛道或路径;环形路线。
cards.example_en: Mario Circuit is a classic racing track loved by fans.
cards.example_zh: 马里奥赛道是深受粉丝喜爱的经典赛道。

cards.definition_en: A flat, round piece of metal used as money; in Mario Kart, increases top speed.
cards.definition_zh: 用作货币的扁平圆形金属片;在马里奥赛车中,提升最高速度。
cards.example_en: Collect coins to increase your kart's maximum speed.
cards.example_zh: 收集金币提升你的卡丁车最高速度。

cards.definition_en: A dry, sandy region with little rainfall and sparse vegetation.
cards.definition_zh: 降雨稀少、植被稀疏的干燥沙质地区。
cards.example_en: Navigate through Desert Hills' challenging sand dunes.
cards.example_zh: 穿越沙漠丘陵充满挑战的沙丘。

cards.definition_en: To slide sideways in a controlled manner, especially while cornering at high speed.
cards.definition_zh: 以受控的方式侧滑,尤其是在高速转弯时。
cards.example_en: Mario performs a perfect drift around the tight corner.
cards.example_zh: 马里奥在急转弯处完美地漂移过弯。

cards.definition_en: A light covering that forms the outer covering of a bird; allows jumping.
cards.definition_zh: 鸟类外层的轻质覆盖物;允许跳跃。
cards.example_en: Use the feather to jump over obstacles on the track!
cards.example_zh: 使用羽毛跳过赛道上的障碍物!

cards.definition_en: To bring to an end; to complete; the final point of a race.
cards.definition_zh: 使结束;完成;比赛的终点。
cards.example_en: Cross the finish line to complete the race!
cards.example_zh: 冲过终点线完成比赛!

cards.definition_en: A colorful plant bloom; in Mario Kart, a special power-up item.
cards.definition_zh: 色彩艳丽的植物花朵;在马里奥赛车中,一种特殊的道具。
cards.example_en: Grab the Fire Flower to shoot fireballs at opponents!
cards.example_zh: 获得火焰花向对手发射火球!

cards.definition_en: A mushroom-like enemy creature from the Mario universe.
cards.definition_zh: 来自马里奥宇宙的蘑菇状敌人生物。
cards.example_en: Avoid the Goombas walking on the race course!
cards.example_zh: 避开在赛道上行走的栗宝宝!

cards.definition_en: A tool with a heavy head for pounding; an offensive item in racing.
cards.definition_zh: 带有沉重头部的敲击工具;赛车中的进攻性道具。
cards.example_en: Throw hammers to knock out racers ahead of you!
cards.example_zh: 投掷锤子击倒你前面的赛车手!

cards.definition_en: A device that makes a loud sound; protects from incoming shells.
cards.definition_zh: 发出响亮声音的装置;保护免受来袭的龟壳攻击。
cards.example_en: Blast the Super Horn to deflect the Spiny Shell!
cards.example_zh: 使用超级喇叭偏转刺甲龟壳!

cards.definition_en: To push oneself off the ground or another surface; to leap.
cards.definition_zh: 将自己从地面或其他表面推起;跳跃。
cards.example_en: Perform a jump boost over ramps for extra speed!
cards.example_zh: 在斜坡上进行跳跃加速获得额外速度!

cards.definition_en: The person who is ahead of others; one who guides or directs.
cards.definition_zh: 领先于他人的人;指引或指导的人。
cards.example_en: Luigi takes the lead in the final lap!
cards.example_zh: 路易吉在最后一圈取得领先!

cards.definition_en: A flash of bright light in the sky during a storm; in Mario Kart, strikes all opponents.
cards.definition_zh: 暴风雨中天空的闪光;在马里奥赛车中,攻击所有对手。
cards.example_en: Lightning shrinks all other racers temporarily!
cards.example_zh: 闪电暂时缩小所有其他赛车手!

cards.definition_en: A large natural elevation of land rising high above its surroundings.
cards.definition_zh: 高出周围环境的大型天然陆地隆起。
cards.example_en: Choco Mountain features steep climbs and sharp turns.
cards.example_zh: 巧克力山拥有陡峭的爬坡和急转弯。

cards.definition_en: A type of fungus; in Mario Kart, an item that provides a speed boost.
cards.definition_zh: 一种真菌;在马里奥赛车中,提供加速提升的道具。
cards.example_en: Use a mushroom to boost past your opponents!
cards.example_zh: 使用蘑菇加速超越你的对手!

cards.definition_en: To move ahead of another competitor, especially on a racetrack.
cards.definition_zh: 在赛道上超过其他对手，占据领先位置。
cards.example_en: Bowser overtakes Wario with a perfectly timed Red Shell.
cards.example_zh: 库巴用精准的红龟壳成功超越瓦里奥。

cards.definition_en: A flightless seabird; appears as an obstacle or character in icy tracks.
cards.definition_zh: 不会飞的海鸟;在冰雪赛道上作为障碍或角色出现。
cards.example_en: Watch out for penguins sliding across the frozen track!
cards.example_zh: 小心企鹅在冰冻赛道上滑行!

cards.definition_en: A daughter of a monarch; a female member of a royal family.
cards.definition_zh: 君主的女儿;皇室的女性成员。
cards.example_en: Princess Peach is an elegant and skilled racer.
cards.example_zh: 碧琪公主是一位优雅而技术娴熟的赛车手。

cards.definition_en: A competition of speed; to compete against others to finish first.
cards.definition_zh: 速度竞赛;与他人竞争以最先完成。
cards.example_en: Luigi enters the VS race to prove his racing skills.
cards.example_zh: 路易吉参加对战比赛证明他的赛车技术。

cards.definition_en: A multicolored arc in the sky caused by light refraction in water droplets.
cards.definition_zh: 天空中因光线在水滴中折射而形成的多色弧形。
cards.example_en: Rainbow Road is the ultimate challenge for racers!
cards.example_zh: 彩虹之路是赛车手的终极挑战!

cards.definition_en: A person competing with another for the same objective or superiority.
cards.definition_zh: 为了同一目标或优势与他人竞争的人。
cards.example_en: Bowser is Mario's biggest rival on the race track.
cards.example_zh: 酷霸王是马里奥在赛道上最大的对手。

cards.definition_en: A paved way for vehicles and pedestrians to travel.
cards.definition_zh: 供车辆和行人通行的铺设路面。
cards.example_en: Roads connect all the courses in Mario Kart World.
cards.example_zh: 道路连接着马里奥赛车世界的所有赛道。

cards.definition_en: A hard protective outer covering, especially in Mario Kart, a weapon item.
cards.definition_zh: 坚硬的保护性外壳,在马里奥赛车中是一种武器道具。
cards.example_en: Bowser throws a red shell to hit the racer ahead.
cards.example_zh: 酷霸王扔出红色龟壳攻击前方的赛车手。

cards.definition_en: The rate at which something moves or operates; rapidity of motion.
cards.definition_zh: 某物移动或运作的速率;运动的快速程度。
cards.example_en: Increase your speed with a mushroom power-up!
cards.example_zh: 用蘑菇道具提升你的速度!

cards.definition_en: A large venue for sporting events with spectator seating.
cards.definition_zh: 举办体育赛事的大型场馆,设有观众席位。
cards.example_en: Peach Stadium hosts exciting kart races.
cards.example_zh: 碧琪体育场举办激动人心的卡丁车比赛。

cards.definition_en: A celestial body; in Mario Kart, a power-up that grants invincibility.
cards.definition_zh: 天体;在马里奥赛车中,一种赋予无敌状态的强化道具。
cards.example_en: Rosalina grabs a super star and becomes invincible.
cards.example_zh: 罗莎琳娜获得无敌星,进入无敌状态。

cards.definition_en: A test of ability or endurance; racing alone to beat the best time.
cards.definition_zh: 能力或耐力的测试;单独比赛以打破最佳时间。
cards.example_en: Race in Time Trial mode to set a new record!
cards.example_zh: 在计时赛模式中创造新纪录!

cards.definition_en: A prize or memento awarded to a winner, typically a decorative object.
cards.definition_zh: 颁发给获胜者的奖品或纪念品,通常是装饰性物品。
cards.example_en: Win the Grand Prix to earn the golden trophy!
cards.example_zh: 赢得大奖赛获得金色奖杯!

cards.definition_en: A sudden burst of extra speed triggered by items or track features.
cards.definition_zh: 由道具或赛道装置触发的瞬间速度爆发。
cards.example_en: A Dash Panel gives Yoshi a turbo boost down the neon straightaway.
cards.example_zh: 冲刺板让耀西在霓虹直道上获得涡轮冲刺。

cards.definition_en: Success in a contest or battle; the act of defeating an opponent.
cards.definition_zh: 在竞赛或战斗中的成功;击败对手的行为。
cards.example_en: Celebrate your victory with the Star Cup trophy!
cards.example_zh: 用星星杯奖杯庆祝你的胜利!
